description: Returns an existing component for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is part of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the component.

nested_items.name: component
nested_items.description: Represents the configuration settings for the component.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app associated with the component.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment that is a part of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: sourceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the component in its original source system, such as Figma.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the component.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the component.

nested_items.name: componentType
nested_items.description: The type of the component. This can be an Amplify custom UI component or another custom component.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: Describes the component's properties. You can't specify tags as a valid property for properties.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value to assign to the component property.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind the component property to data at runtime.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The component property to bind to the data field.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The data field to bind the property to.

nested_items.name: collectionBindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind the component property to data at runtime. Use this for collection components.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The component property to bind to the data field.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The data field to bind the property to.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value to assign to the component property.

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: The data model to use to assign a value to the component property.

nested_items.name: element
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: element
nested_items.description: The name of the component to retrieve a value from.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The property to retrieve a value from.

nested_items.name: event
nested_items.description: An event that occurs in your app. Use this for workflow data binding.

nested_items.name: userAttribute
nested_items.description: An authenticated user attribute to use to assign a value to the component property.

nested_items.name: concat
nested_items.description: A list of component properties to concatenate to create the value to assign to this component property.

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The conditional expression to use to assign a value to the component property.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The name of the conditional property.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The name of a field. Specify this when the property is a data model.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use to perform the evaluation, such as eq to represent equals.

nested_items.name: operand
nested_items.description: The value of the property to evaluate.

nested_items.name: operandType
nested_items.description: The type of the property to evaluate.

nested_items.name: configured
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the user configured the property in Amplify Studio after importing it.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The component type.

nested_items.name: importedValue
nested_items.description: The default value assigned to the property when the component is imported into an app.

nested_items.name: componentName
nested_items.description: The name of the component that is affected by an event.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The name of the component's property that is affected by an event.

nested_items.name: children
nested_items.description: A list of the component's ComponentChild instances.

nested_items.name: componentType
nested_items.description: The type of the child component.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the child component.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: Describes the properties of the child component. You can't specify tags as a valid property for properties.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value to assign to the component property.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind the component property to data at runtime.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The component property to bind to the data field.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The data field to bind the property to.

nested_items.name: field

nested_items.name: defaultValue

nested_items.name: concat
nested_items.description: A list of component properties to concatenate to create the value to assign to this component property.

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The conditional expression to use to assign a value to the component property.

nested_items.name: property

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The name of a field. Specify this when the property is a data model.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use to perform the evaluation, such as eq to represent equals.

nested_items.name: operand
nested_items.description: The value of the property to evaluate.

nested_items.name: operandType
nested_items.description: The type of the property to evaluate.

nested_items.name: configured

nested_items.name: importedValue
nested_items.description: The default value assigned to the property when the component is imported into an app.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The name of the component's property that is affected by an event.

nested_items.name: children
nested_items.description: The list of ComponentChild instances for this component.

nested_items.name: action

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The component type.

nested_items.name: importedValue
nested_items.description: The default value assigned to the property when the component is imported into an app.

nested_items.name: componentName
nested_items.description: The name of the component that is affected by an event.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The name of the component's property that is affected by an event.

nested_items.name: bindingEvent
nested_items.description: Binds an event to an action on a component. When you specify a bindingEvent, the event is called when the action is performed.

nested_items.name: sourceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the child component in its original source system, such as Figma.

nested_items.name: variants
nested_items.description: A list of the component's variants. A variant is a unique style configuration of a main component.

nested_items.name: variantValues
nested_items.description: The combination of variants that comprise this variant. You can't specify tags as a valid property for variantValues.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: overrides
nested_items.description: The properties of the component variant that can be overriden when customizing an instance of the component. You can't specify tags as a valid property for overrides.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: overrides
nested_items.description: Describes the component's properties that can be overriden in a customized instance of the component. You can't specify tags as a valid property for overrides.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to connect a component's properties to data at runtime. You can't specify tags as a valid property for bindingProperties.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The property type.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: Describes the properties to customize with data at runtime.

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: An Amplify DataStore model.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The field to bind the data to.

nested_items.name: predicates
nested_items.description: A list of predicates for binding a component's properties to data.

nested_items.name: or
nested_items.description: A list of predicates to combine logically.

nested_items.name: and
nested_items.description: A list of predicates to combine logically.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The field to query.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use to perform the evaluation.

nested_items.name: operand
nested_items.description: The value to use when performing the evaluation.

nested_items.name: operandType
nested_items.description: The type of value to use when performing the evaluation.

nested_items.name: userAttribute
nested_items.description: An authenticated user attribute.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The storage key for an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value to assign to the property.

nested_items.name: slotName
nested_items.description: The name of a component slot.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of the property.

nested_items.name: collectionProperties
nested_items.description: The data binding configuration for the component's properties. Use this for a collection component. You can't specify tags as a valid property for collectionProperties.

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: The name of the data model to use to bind data to a component.

nested_items.name: sort
nested_items.description: Describes how to sort the component's properties.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The field to perform the sort on.

nested_items.name: direction
nested_items.description: The direction of the sort, either ascending or descending.

nested_items.name: predicate
nested_items.description: Represents the conditional logic to use when binding data to a component. Use this property to retrieve only a subset of the data in a collection.

nested_items.name: or
nested_items.description: A list of predicates to combine logically.

nested_items.name: and
nested_items.description: A list of predicates to combine logically.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The field to query.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The operator to use to perform the evaluation.

nested_items.name: operand
nested_items.description: The value to use when performing the evaluation.

nested_items.name: operandType
nested_items.description: The type of value to use when performing the evaluation.

nested_items.name: identifiers
nested_items.description: A list of IDs to use to bind data to a component. Use this property to bind specifically chosen data, rather than data retrieved from a query.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time that the component was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time that the component was modified.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action to perform when a specific event is raised.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Describes information about the action.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value to assign to the component property.

nested_items.description: The information to bind the component property to data at runtime.

nested_items.description: The component property to bind to the data field.
